publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3636 Tommy Sheridan: Solidarity with Firefighters—That the Parliament congratulates Labour MSP Cathy Peattie for her solidarity with the firefighters and her remarks reported in the Daily Record on 23 November 2002 that she is ashamed of John Prescott and calls on all MSPs to back the firefighters in their week of action to secure their just wage claim.
S1M-3636 Solidarity with Firefighters (lodged on 25 November 2002) Dorothy-Grace Elder*

S1M-3636 Tommy Sheridan: Solidarity with Firefighters—That the Parliament congratulates Labour MSP Cathy Peattie for her solidarity with the firefighters and her remarks reported in the Daily Record on 23 November 2002 that she is ashamed of John Prescott and calls on all MSPs to back the firefighters in their week of action to secure their just wage claim.Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
